title: Chopard Happy Diamond 18ct Yellow Gold
description: Chopard Happy Diamond 18ct yellow gold quartz ladies watch. Gold dial, 5 floating Diamonds, approximate case diameter: 21mm, wrist size: 16cm, Swiss made. Ref# 4112. With Chopard 18ct yellow gold bracelet and clasp. With Certificate of Authenticity, Chopard Certificate of Origin & Guarantee dated February 1992, Chopard Service card dated 14/02/1992 and Chopard box. 3 month FSA warranty. Weight: 45.4g (Pre-owned)
